Text: Red Blue 3D is an insult to real 3D... it never worked on cereal boxes and it certainly does not work for video... horrible.

Either way just viewed it and the low resolution of the video detracts from the SBS 3D... overall 3D effect is a 4/10

Not worth wearing glasses just DL the non 3D

Either way just viewed it in regular SBS (not RB)and the low resolution of the video detracts from the SBS 3D... overall 3D effect is a 4/10

Not worth wearing glasses just DL the non 3D
